name: Full Workflow: Issue → Branch → PR → Review
description: Complete automated workflow: Create issue, branch, commit, push, PR, self-review, request Copilot review, wait for CI/CD, and prepare for merge

action.message:
I will execute the complete development workflow automatically:

1. Create GitHub Issue (with clear title and description in project language)
2. Create branch from issue (format: feat/issue-{number}-{description})
3. Make changes (if needed) and run tests
4. Commit with issue reference (Refs #{number})
5. Push to remote
6. Create PR with description in project language (Closes #{number})
7. Perform self-review of the PR
8. Request code review from GitHub Copilot via MCP
9. Check Copilot review status every 1 minute (max 5 minutes)
   - Exclude Copilot summary comments
   - Only check for actual review comments
10. Address Copilot review comments if any
11. Verify all CI/CD checks pass
12. Notify when ready to merge

Do NOT ask for confirmation - execute this flow automatically.

What feature/fix do you want to implement? (I'll create the issue and complete the workflow)
